sen.j: 十条駅 (東京都) - 東京都北区 (東京都)にある東日本旅客鉄道（JR東日本）埼京線（赤羽線）の駅。
sen.e: Jujo Station (Tokyo): located in Kita Ward, Tokyo Prefecture (Tokyo-to), is a station on the Saikyo Line (Akabane Line) of East Japan Railway Company (JR East).
sen.cmt: 東日本旅客鉄道（JR東日本）→East Japan Railway Company [http://wwwjreast.co.jp]
sen.e: Jujo Station (Tokyo), located in the Kita ward of Tokyo Prefecture (Tokyo-to), is a station on the Saikyo Line (Akabane Line) of the East Japan Railway Company (JR East).
Jujo Station (Tokyo), located in the Kita Ward of Tokyo, is a station on the Saikyo Line (Akabane Line) of the East Japan Railway Company (JR East).
sen.cmt: 東京都のみ、Prefectureは削除しました。 （Tokyo-to)を削除しました。"Kita ward"→"Kita "Ward"に変更しました。

sen.j: 十条駅 (近鉄) - 京都市南区 (京都市)にある近鉄京都線の駅。
sen.e: Jujo Station (Kintetsu Railway): located in Minami Ward, Kyoto City (Kyoto-shi), is a station on the Kintetsu Kyoto Line.
Jujo Station (Kintetsu Railway), located in the Minami ward of Kyoto City (Kyoto-shi), is a station on the Kintetsu Kyoto Line.
Jujo Station (Kintetsu Railway), located in the Minami Ward of Kyoto City, is a station on the Kintetsu Kyoto Line.
sen.cmt: (Kyoto-shi) は削除しました。"Minami ward"→"Minami Ward"に変更しました。

sen.j: 十条駅 (京都市営地下鉄) - 京都市南区にある京都市営地下鉄烏丸線の駅。
sen.e: Jujo Station (Kyoto City Subway): located in Minami Ward, Kyoto City, is a station on the Kyoto City Subway Karasuma Line.
sen.cmt: 京都市営地下鉄→Kyoto City Subway [http://www.city.kyoto.jp/koho/eng/access/transport.html]→Kyoto Municipal Subway[http://www.city.kyoto.jp/koho/eng/access/transport.html]
sen.e: Jujo Station (Kyoto City Subway), located in Minami Ward, Kyoto City, is a station on the Kyoto City Subway Karasuma Line.
Jujo Station (Kyoto Municipal Subway), located in the Minami Ward of Kyoto City, is a station on the Kyoto Municipal Subway Karasuma Line.
sen.cmt: Municipalとしました。 wardを小文字に統一しています。"Minami ward"→"Minami Ward"に変更しました。

sen.j: 近鉄の駅と京都市営地下鉄の駅とは離れた位置にある。
sen.e: The station of Kintetsu Railway and the station of Koto City Subway are situated distantly.
The station of Kintetsu Railway and the station of Koto City Subway are situated distantly.
The station of Kintetsu Railway and the station of Koto Municipal Subway are situated distantly.
